layer_description: Auto-converted on 2025-11-04 from legacy CSV; 131 columns.

columns.name: brat_capacity
columns.description: The existing number of beaver dams per unit of riverscape length that the riverscape can support

columns.name: brat_hist_capacity
columns.description: The historic number of beaver dams per unit of riverscapes length that the riverscape could support based on modeled historic vegetation

columns.name: brat_risk
columns.description: Categorical values of risk that beaver dam building activity could pose to human infrastructure

columns.name: brat_opportunity
columns.description: Categorical values of beaver-related restoration and conservation opportunities

columns.name: brat_limitation
columns.friendly_name: Limiting Factors to Bever Dam Restoration
columns.description: Categorical natural and anthropogenic limitations on beaver dam building

columns.name: brat_complex_size
columns.description: The number of dams the section of riverscape could support

columns.name: brat_hist_complex_size
columns.description: The number of dams the section of riverscapes could historically support based on modeled historic vegetation

columns.name: dam_setting
columns.description: Beaver dam setting (classic, steep, floodplain)

columns.name: ownership
columns.description: Dominant ownership within the DGO

columns.name: state
columns.description: The dominant US state within the DGO

columns.name: county
columns.description: The dominant county within the DGO

columns.name: drainage_area
columns.description: The drainage area of the primary channel in the DGO

columns.name: watershed_id
columns.description: The 10-digit USGS watershed Hydrologic Unit Code

columns.name: stream_name
columns.description: The name of the primary stream in the DGO

columns.name: stream_order
columns.description: Strahler Stream Order of the primary stream in the DGO

columns.name: headwater
columns.description: zero if not a headwater, one if a headwater

columns.name: stream_length
columns.description: Sum of stream segment lengths (NHD flow lines) within the DGO

columns.name: waterbody_type
columns.description: The NHD FCode of waterbody within the DGO

columns.name: waterbody_extent
columns.description: The area of waterbody within the DGO

columns.name: ecoregion3
columns.description: EPA Ecoregion Level 3

columns.name: ecoregion4
columns.description: EPA Ecoregion Level 4

columns.name: elevation
columns.description: The minimum elevation in the DGO

columns.name: geology
columns.description: The dominant geology type within the DGO

columns.name: huc12
columns.description: The 12-digit USGS watershed Hydrologic Unit Code

columns.name: prim_channel_gradient
columns.description: The gradient of the primary channel in the DGO

columns.name: valleybottom_gradient
columns.description: The gradient of the riverscape centerline

columns.name: rel_flow_length
columns.description: Sum of stream lengths in the DGO divided by length of valley centerline

columns.name: confluences
columns.description: Number of anabranch confluences within the DGO

columns.name: diffluences
columns.description: Number of anabranch diffluences within the DGO

columns.name: tributaries
columns.description: Number of tributary confluences within the DGO

columns.name: tribs_per_km
columns.description: The number of tributaries per unit of riverscape length.

columns.name: planform_sinuosity
columns.description: Sum of river length divided by the valley bottom length within moving window.

columns.name: lowlying_area
columns.description: The area of valley bottom classified as 'low_lying' within the DGO

columns.name: elevated_area
columns.description: The area of valley bottom classified as 'elevated' within the DGO

columns.name: channel_area
columns.description: The area of active channel within the DGO.

columns.name: floodplain_area
columns.description: The area of active floodplain within the DGO.

columns.name: integrated_width
columns.description: The width of the riverscape

columns.name: active_channel_ratio
columns.description: The proportion of the riverscape that is active channel

columns.name: low_lying_ratio
columns.description: The proportion of the riversape that is relatively low-lying surface

columns.name: elevated_ratio
columns.description: The proportion of the riverscape that is relatively elevated surface

columns.name: floodplain_ratio
columns.description: proportion of the riverscape that is floodplain (low-lying + elevated; not channel)

columns.name: acres_vb_per_mile
columns.description: Area of valley bottom per riverscape length

columns.name: hect_vb_per_km
columns.description: Area of valley bottom per riverscape length

columns.name: channel_width
columns.description: Width of the primary channel in the DGO

columns.name: confinement_ratio
columns.description: The ratio of channel length that abuts a confining margin to the total channel length

columns.name: constriction_ratio
columns.description: The ratio of channel length constricted by confining margins on both sides to total channel length

columns.name: confining_margins
columns.description: The length of confining margins within the DGO

columns.name: constricting_margins
columns.description: The length of constricting margins (confining on both sides of the channel simultaneously) within the DGO

columns.name: qlow
columns.description: Low flow value of the primary channel in the DGO

columns.name: q2
columns.description: Typical flood (Q2) flow value of the primary channel in the DGO

columns.name: splow
columns.description: Low flow stream power

columns.name: sphigh
columns.description: Typical flood (Q2) stream power

columns.name: road_len
columns.description: Length of roads within the DGO

columns.name: road_dens
columns.description: Length of roads per length of riverscape centerline

columns.name: rail_len
columns.description: Length of railroads within the DGO

columns.name: rail_dens
columns.description: Length of railroads per length of riverscape centerline

columns.name: land_use_intens
columns.description: Land use intensity from 0 (None) to 100 (High) within the DGO

columns.name: road_dist
columns.friendly_name: Minimum Distance Between Channel and Roads
columns.description: The minimum distance between roads and river channels

columns.name: rail_dist
columns.friendly_name: Minimum Distance Between Channel and Railroads
columns.description: The minimum distance between railroads and river channels

columns.name: div_dist
columns.friendly_name: Minimum Distance Between Channel and Diversions
columns.description: The minimum distance between diversion points and river channels

columns.name: canal_dist
columns.friendly_name: Minimum Distance Between Channel and Canals
columns.description: The minimum distance between canals and river channels

columns.name: infra_dist
columns.friendly_name: Minimum Distance Between Channel and Infrastructure
columns.description: The minimum distance between any infrastructure and river channels

columns.name: fldpln_access
columns.description: The proportion of flooplain accessible to the channel (e.g., via lateral migration)

columns.name: access_fldpln_extent
columns.description: The area of the accessible floodplain

columns.name: lf_evt
columns.description: The dominant Landfire EVT classes

columns.name: lf_bps
columns.description: The dominant Landfire BpS classes

columns.name: lf_agriculture_prop
columns.description: The proportion of agricultural cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_agriculture
columns.description: The area of agricultural cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_conifer_prop
columns.description: The proportion of conifer cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_conifer
columns.description: The area of conifer cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_conifer_hardwood_prop
columns.description: The proportion of mixed conifer-hardwood cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_conifer_hardwood
columns.description: The area of mixed conifer-hardwood cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_developed_prop
columns.description: The proportion of the riverscape that is developed

columns.name: lf_developed
columns.description: The area of the riverscape that is developed

columns.name: lf_exotic_herbaceous_prop
columns.description: The proportion exotic herbaceous cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_exotic_herbaceous
columns.description: The area of exotic herbaceous cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_exotic_tree_shrub_prop
columns.description: The proportion of exotic tree and shrub cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_exotic_tree_shrub
columns.description: The area of exotic tree and shrub cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_grassland_prop
columns.description: The proportion of grassland cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_grassland
columns.description: The area of grassland cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hardwood_prop
columns.description: The proportion of hardwood forest cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hardwood
columns.description: The area of hardwood forest cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_riparian_prop
columns.description: The proportion of riparian vegetation cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_riparian
columns.description: The area of riparian vegetation cover in the riverscape (from LandFire)

columns.name: lf_shrubland_prop
columns.description: The proportion of shrubland cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_shrubland
columns.description: The area of shrubland cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_sparsely_vegetated_prop
columns.description: The proportion of the riverscape that is sparsely vegetated

columns.name: lf_sparsely_vegetated
columns.description: The area of the riverscape that is sparsely vegetated

columns.name: lf_hist_conifer_prop
columns.description: The historic proportion of conifer cover in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_conifer
columns.description: The historic area of conifer cover in the riverscape

columns.description: The historic proportion of mixed conifer-hardwood forest in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_conifer_hardwood
columns.description: The historic area of mixed conifer-hardwood forest in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_grassland_prop
columns.description: The historic proportion of grassland in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_grassland
columns.description: The historic area of grassland in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_hardwood_prop
columns.description: The historic proportion of hardwood forest in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_hardwood
columns.description: The historic area of hardwood forest in the riverscape

columns.description: The historic proportion of mixed hardwood-conifer forest in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_hardwood_conifer
columns.description: The historic area of mixed hardwood-conifer forest in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_peatland_forest_prop
columns.description: The historic proportion of peatland forest in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_peatland_forest
columns.description: The historic area of peatland forest in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_peatland_nonforest_prop
columns.description: The historic proportion of non-forested peatland in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_peatland_nonforest
columns.description: The historic area of non-forested peatland in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_riparian_prop
columns.description: The historic proportion of riparian vegetation in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_riparian
columns.description: The historic area of riparian vegetation in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_savanna_prop
columns.description: The historic proportion of savanna in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_savanna
columns.description: The historic area of savanna in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_shrubland_prop
columns.description: The historic proportion of shrubland in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_shrubland
columns.description: The historic area of shrubland in the riverscape

columns.name: lf_hist_sparsely_vegetated_prop
columns.description: The historic proportion of the riverscape that was sparsely vegetated

columns.name: lf_hist_sparsely_vegetated
columns.description: The historic area of the riverscape that was sparsely vegetated

columns.name: ex_riparian
columns.description: Area of existing riparian vegetation (as calculated by RCAT, which includes additonal landfire categories)

columns.name: hist_riparian
columns.description: Area of historic riparian vegetation (as calculated by RCAT, which includes additonal landfire categories)

columns.name: prop_riparian
columns.description: The area of existing riparian cover divided by the area of the riverscape

columns.name: hist_prop_riparian
columns.description: The area of historic riparian cover divided by the area of the riverscape

columns.name: riparian_veg_departure
columns.description: Ratio of existing riparian vegetation cover over historic riparian vegetation cover. This is often expressed or symbolized as departure from historic which is 1 minus this value. Value of -9999 means valley too narrow to sample.

columns.name: ag_conversion
columns.description: The proportion of historic riparian vegetation converted to agriculture

columns.name: develop
columns.description: The proportion of historic riparian vegetation converted to developed

columns.name: grass_shrub_conversion
columns.description: The proportion of historic riparian vegetation converted to grass-shrubland

columns.name: conifer_encroachment
columns.description: The proportion of historic riparian vegetation converted to conifer

columns.name: invasive_conversion
columns.friendly_name: Conversion from Native Riparian to Invasive
columns.description: The proportion of historic riparian vegetation converted to invasive vegetation

columns.name: riparian_condition
columns.description: A riparian condition index from (0) poor to (1) intact based on riparian vegetation departure, land use intensity, and floodplain accessibility

columns.name: geom
columns.description: Well-known-binary (WKB) representation of the DGO Polygon

columns.name: level_path
columns.description: the NHD level path, which is a unique identifier for each stream from its origin to its end in the NHDPlusHR dataset

columns.name: seg_distance
columns.description: (From VBET) the distance along a given level path that the IGO is located (used for toplogical purposes)

columns.name: centerline_length
columns.description: The length of valley centerline

columns.name: segment_area
columns.description: the area of the DGO polygon

columns.name: fcode
columns.description: The NHD Feature Code representing flow type of the primary channel

columns.name: rme_project_id
columns.description: Project ID for the source metric engine project on Riverscapes Data Exchange, data.riverscapes.net

columns.name: rme_date_created_ts
columns.description: Timestamp of date RME project was created

columns.name: rme_version
columns.description: RME Version as string, e.g. 1.3.4

columns.name: rme_version_int
columns.description: RME Version as integer e.g. 10
